channel.title: ~@:{( Arrows )}:@~ -- #4 ? -- Help please
channel.description:
Okay, recently ive been working/testing alot, with my range stuff.. And this one has been a problem ({Which i can't fix}) for like ages... When i shoot someone with any bow? And there are alot of people around me, the arrow some times tends to go to a different player... Just shoots any random way every time... Is there a way to make the arrow LOCK ON to the target, only hit the target your shooting? By target, i mean enemy... NOT NPC... I couldn't care a less atm.. I just want player V player fixed for start.
If you do know the answer, could you please post? And please.. Im asking, no posts like "You have to add (EXAMPLE)"
Cause i'll be like, uhmm, ok? wtf...
P.S -- Helpful posts only please, if your going to be a jerk and post just to get your post count up, like "Oo i need this too" "Yeah ive been wondering how, if you find out, post success" "Wrong section" "HAHAHAAH NOOB" ... Dont post at all...
Appreciated, thanks

item.title: ~@:{( Arrows )}:@~ -- #4 ? -- Help please
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“X-J-K-X, post:7, topic:141087”]Im not wrong on this… Because its been said lots of times…
If a source is glitched, it can be un-glitched…
If a source is bugged, it can be un-bugged…
If a source has errors, you can take the errors out…
If a source is totally fuxed, you can fix it, all you need is knowledge…

And the knowledge for this, i havent got… Thats why im asking… + Fr33sc4p3 is a crappy source IMO…
And i cba taking most of my work and transfering it…[/quote]

Actually false, WhiteScape has some packet error no one can even fix, not even WhiteFang (creator of WhiteScape).

Read full topic
